item.description: Let's meet at the south end of the stadium, which is just off Rocky Hill Road in Amherst. Not really a hike, but let's get together at the UMass Stadium grounds to walk the circular track and/or have some playtime with our furry companions. The weather should be nice, and there's lots of room. You may wish to bring water for yourself and your dog(s). See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be near the entrance to the track,with a black lab with a green leash

group.name: Western Mass Dogs - Walks and more!

item.name: Stadium Stroll, UMass, Amherst
